[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@invertase/firestore-stripe-payments](./firestore-stripe-payments.md) &gt; [Price](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.md) &gt; [interval\_count](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.interval_count.md)

## Price.interval\_count property

The number of intervals (specified in the [Price.interval](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.interval.md) attribute) between subscription billings. For example, `interval=month` and `interval_count=3` bills every 3 months.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly interval_count: number | null;
```
